title: Update ticker run help text with workflow documentation
description:
Update 'ticker run --help' to include agent signal and human workflow documentation:

Add sections for:
- AGENT SIGNALS: List all 8 signal types and meanings
- TASK FILTERING: Explain awaiting exclusion  
- HUMAN WORKFLOW: Show tk approve/reject/next --awaiting workflow

Reference docs/AGENT_HUMAN_WORKFLOW.md 'ticker CLI Help' section.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] Signal types listed in help
- [ ] Task filtering explained
- [ ] Human workflow commands shown
- [ ] --watch flag documented (when implemented)
